titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Committee for the Militia: concerning the penalties that are to be inflicted upon those of the trained-bands that exempt themselves in this present expedition. Together with a declaration of the Commons assembled in Parliament, for the raising of money, plate, and horse, to be imployed for the aid and assistance of the Lord Fairfax. Ordered by the Commons in Parliament, that this be forthwith printed and published: H: Elsynge, Cler. Parl. D. Com.
titleStmt.author: Committee for the Militia of London.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons. aut

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
